entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
